|castingnoise=4 |spellnoise=0 }} {{Flavour|This spell allows the caster to phase in and out of the material plane, allowing them to occasionally avoid blows entirely.}} '''Phase Shift''' is a level 5 [[Translocation]] spell that temporarily boosts your [[evasion]] by 8. Its duration is determined by your [[spell power]] (4+1dPower), but is fairly short regardless, maxing out at 30 turns. Players afflicted by [[Dimension Anchor]] will instantly have their Phase Shift canceled and are prevented from recasting it for the duration of its effect. Note that other forms of teleportation prevention ('''-TELE'''), such as from [[randart]]s, do not affect this spell. ==Strategy== Although too expensive and short lived to keep up constantly, +8 EV can make a big difference in single fights with dangerous opponents. Use it while waiting for the enemy to move into range. ==History== Phase Shift was removed in [[0.18]]. [[Category:Obsolete spells]]
